name: Content Marketing for WordPress by Detailed
author: Roberto Ramos for Detailed.com

sections.description:
Content Marketing for WordPress by Detailed. Get title suggestions for your posts and pages.

Service

This plugin performs external calls to the URL:

http://2rdesignsap.com/tests/ContentMarketingWordpress/suggestions/

This is where our proprietary suggestion algorithm is located. The algorithm processes
the user input and then returns suggestions depending on what the user entered.

We don’t include this algorithm in the plugin code, because we try to keep it private.
sections.installation:
1. Upload Content Marketing for WordPress by Detailed to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory and unzip, or open the ZIP package locally and upload the /detailed-content-marketing folder into your plug-ins directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. That is it!
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload Content Marketing for WordPress by Detailed to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory and unzip, or open the ZIP package locally and upload the /detailed-content-marketing folder into your plug-ins directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. That is it!
